documentation.content:
- A "FailedScheduling" event occurs when a pending pod cannot be scheduled, This alert fires when an event with reason "FailedSceduling" occurs in the logs; limited to notifying once per hour.
- We recommend troubleshooting this incident with the [Unschedulable Pods interactive playbook](https://console.cloud.google.com/monitoring/dashboards/gke-troubleshooting/unschedulable?project=${metric_or_resource.label.project_id}&f.sd_ts_playbook.cluster_name=${metric_or_resource.label.cluster_name}&f.sd_ts_playbook.location=${metric_or_resource.label.location}), which shows detailed instructions, metrics, and logs.

conditions.displayName: ${metric_or_resource.label.cluster_name} cluster has a FailedScheduling Log Event
